meanings.definition: The act of removing or lessening inhibitions.
meanings.sent1: His disinhibition at the party led to some embarrassing moments.
meanings.sent2: After a few drinks, she experienced disinhibition and danced freely.
meanings.sent3: The disinhibition of the shy student at the talent show surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her disinhibition on the dance floor was like a burst of colorful confetti.
meanings.sent5: The disinhibition of the dog when off-leash was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: A temporary loss of self-restraint or control.
meanings.sent1: The disinhibition caused by the medication made him say things he regretted.
meanings.sent2: During the game, the team's disinhibition led to risky plays.
meanings.sent3: The disinhibition of the toddler in the toy store was adorable to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her disinhibition on the rollercoaster was like a wild, exhilarating ride.
meanings.sent5: The disinhibition of the crowd at the concert created an electric atmosphere.
